original_metadata.paper_title: ECC Analyzer: Extract Trading Signal from Earnings Conference Calls using Large Language Model for Stock Performance Prediction
original_metadata.table_caption: Table 2.Performance results of ablation study. We designed the ablation study as follows: 1) Audio+Text: uses raw audio and text data from ECCs; 2)Audio+Text+Eo⁢ssubscript𝐸𝑜𝑠E_{os}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: adds an overall ECC summary generated by LLMs; 3)Audio+Text+Ec⁢ssubscript𝐸𝑐𝑠E_{cs}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: adds the chucks summary generated by LLMs; 4) Audio+Text+Eo⁢s+Ec⁢ssubscript𝐸𝑜𝑠subscript𝐸𝑐𝑠E_{os}+E_{cs}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: integrates both overall and chunk summaries for the ECC; 5) Audio+Text+Ef⁢osubscript𝐸𝑓𝑜E_{fo}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f italic_o end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: combines raw data with focused analytical results; 6)Eo⁢s+Ec⁢s+Ef⁢osubscript𝐸𝑜𝑠subscript𝐸𝑐𝑠subscript𝐸𝑓𝑜E_{os}+E_{cs}+E_{fo}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f italic_o end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: merges all LLM analyses for prediction without raw data; 6) Audio+Text+Eo⁢s+Ec⁢s+Ef⁢osubscript𝐸𝑜𝑠subscript𝐸𝑐𝑠subscript𝐸𝑓𝑜E_{os}+E_{cs}+E_{fo}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f italic_o end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: combines all data and analyses for enhanced prediction.
